headline: Why The Narrative Around LendingTree (TREE) Is Shifting After Q3 Updates And New Targets
summary: LendingTree’s latest fair value model keeps the core estimate steady at US$81.33, while a slightly lower discount rate and essentially unchanged revenue growth expectations suggest a more confident view of the same fundamental story. Recent Street research, tied closely to Q3 results and updated guidance, helps explain why analysts are clustering price targets in the US$70 to low US$80 range, with firms such as JPMorgan pointing to broad-based segment strength and improving operating...
